Spirit and Chaos is an artistic biopic of Miyazawa Kenji, a Japanese poet and writer who was active in the early 20th century. Centered on Miyazawa’s own life, this film depicts our main character at the age of 18 (youth). Miyazawa is the son of a school teacher who was appointed to a very small town in the north of Japan.
